name: No Time to Cake!
description:
No Time to Cake! 

A hectic local multiplayer cake decorating game!

Rush to make the most impressive, coolio cake of all your friends before time runs out! Then be prepared for the Cake Judge to choose the best cake!

Tag any screenshots you share with #NoTimeToCake and/or @ollie_the_robot & @mutantcassidy <3

Bug Fix Update: Olive found and fixed major bugs in the game! We are planning on making the game even better, so stay tuned for that as well. (5:00 pm 8.6.17)

Created by Team Cake for the Short and Sweet Jam in one week!

Programming & Design: Olive M.  <3 ollietherobot.itch.io @ollie_the_robot

Art: Cassidy Aquilino-Berg <3 @mutantcassidy

Music: TrashFever <3

Writing & Design: Faye Rivera <3

Have fun! Let's Cake!
